attributes.action: A referendum on whether the UK should have a American style constitution.
attributes.additional_details: The current state of the UK economically and socially is on the brink of collapse, and British citizens are at boiling point with parliament, the state of the current political parties and the globalist agenda of mass migration. We ask you put this to a referendum, let British citizens decide if we want to keep the current unwritten constitution or have a American style constitution that favours British Citizens above anyone else.
attributes.background: The UK has an unwritten constitution, which relies on conventions, legal precedents, and Acts of Parliament. It can easily be manipulated, and does not inherently favour British citizens over others. A American style constitution that favours British citizens is needed to protect are way of life.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700677
